reviewText:
I will list the movies in the disc here, I suggest you read the reviews of each movie elsewhere.

-The Skin Game
-Number 17
-The Ring
-Jamaica Inn
-Murder!
-Sabotage
-The Lodger
-Blackmail
-Easy Virtue
-Rich & Strange
-The Sorcerer's Apprentice
-The Farmer's Wife

There are 8 DVDs in the set in a fairly decent package.
If you like Hitchcock, these are great.  This was purchased as a gift.  Good collection of episodes on this set.
